sentences.en: A couple of sections of the book will need to be revised.
sentences.cn: 本书部分章节需要修订。

sentences.en: a revised edition of a textbook
sentences.cn: 课本的修订版

sentences.en: All neighbor states must revise their policy fundaments.
sentences.cn: 所有邻国都必须改变他们的施政基本原则.

sentences.en: Don't revise a few topics to the exclusion of all others.
sentences.cn: 不要修改少数论题以致排除所有其他的.

sentences.en: For the open bid, bidders may revise their bids repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 对于开放式招标, 投标者们可以反复修改自己的标书.

sentences.en: He soon came to revise his opinion of the profession.
sentences.cn: 他很快就改变了对这个职业的看法。

sentences.en: He undertook to revise the composition for me.
sentences.cn: 他许诺为我修改作文.

sentences.en: I can see I will have to revise my opinions of his abilities now.
sentences.cn: 我明白我现在不得不改变对他的能力的看法了。

sentences.en: I'll have to revise my ideas about Tom.
sentences.cn: 我必须改变对汤姆的看法.

sentences.en: I’ve got to revise my geography.
sentences.cn: 我得复习一下地理。

sentences.en: It needs further discussion as regards how to revise the play.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本如何修改,尚待讨论.

sentences.en: Lily was nineteen when circumstances caused her to revise her view of the universe.
sentences.cn: 丽莉十九岁时,种种情况使她改变了世界观.

sentences.en: Parties hereto may revise or supplement through negotiation matters not mentioned herein.
sentences.cn: 本合同如有未尽事宜,双方可协商修订或补充.

sentences.en: Records of 224 plots in Tennessee are being used to test and revise this method.
sentences.cn: 在田纳西州的224个样品的记录正用于检验和修订.

sentences.en: She undertook to revise my compositions.
sentences.cn: 她着手批改我的作文.

sentences.en: The college has revised its plans because of local objections.
sentences.cn: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.en: The staff should work together to revise the school curriculum.
sentences.cn: 全体教职工应当齐心协力修订学校课程。

sentences.en: They'll have to revise the census returns before I'm done with this place.
sentences.cn: 我在这地方干完了工作,人家就得修改户口调查表啦.

sentences.en: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.cn: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

sentences.en: You should revise your opinion of him.
sentences.cn: 你应该纠正对他的看法.

words.tran_cn: 修改；校订；复习（revise的过去分词形式）
[图情]修订；[印刷]校订；复习功课

trans.tran_en: to change something because of new information or ideas

trans.tran_cn: 修订，改变，修正，[主英国英语]复习
